entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -24.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -24.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -27.5°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
